Articles.Content:
Behold, my newest replica... The K-10 Kerbhog!!!

IMAGES: [http://imgur.com/a/Axdso](http://imgur.com/a/Axdso) If you want more images, just ask!

As you can see, it carries four sidewinder missiles, One GAU-8 turret, four hellfire missiles, and two mk82 bombs. It is a replica of the A-10 Thunderbolt, and the payload is as accurate as I could get it. 

MODS THAT YOU WILL NEED:

QuizTech Aerospace

BD Armory

Downloads: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/psjgxbz3dvigsho/K-10.craft?dl=0&s=sl](https://www.dropbox.com/s/psjgxbz3dvigsho/K-10.craft?dl=0&s=sl)

[http://www./download/j79r9xpmuqg4dpb/K-10.craft](http://www./download/j79r9xpmuqg4dpb/K-10.craft)

These are the only two mods that the craft uses, but if it does not work I will give you my full list of mods, just in case there is a random part or something.

Please put feedback in the comments!

EDIT: If you want images in the post, please tell me how as I do not go on this forum much.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-24T00:18:12Z" title="05/24/2015 12:18  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 24, 2015</time> by 88theturbo**
